1: Dil ke kone se awaz ati hai Hame har pal unki yaad ati hai Dil puchta hai bar bar hamse Ki jitna ham yaad krte hai unhe Kya unhe bhi hmari yaad ati hai

2: Muskurahat Ka Koi Mol Nahi Hota Kuch Rishto Ka Koi Tol Nahi Hota Wese Log To Mil Jate Hai Har Mod Par Par Koi Aap Ki Tarah Anmol Nhi Hota

3: Zindagi Leher Thi Aap Sahil Hue Na Jane Kese Ham Apke Kabil Hue Na Bhula Payge Ham Us Hasi Pal Ko Jab Aap Hamari Zindagi Me Shamil Hue

4: Suraj Wo Jo Din Bhar Asman Ka Sath De Chand Wo Jo Raat Bhar Taron Ka Sath De Pyar Wo Jo Zindagi Bhar Sath DE Or Dost Wo Jo Pal Pal Mai Sath DE

5: Zindagi Me Apki ahmiyat Ham Apko Bata Nahi Sakta Dil Me Apki Jagah Ham Apko Dikha Nahi Sakte Kuch Rishtey Bhut Anmol Hote Hai Isse Zyada Ham Apko Samjha Nahi Sakte

6: Samne Ho Manzil To Kadam Na Modna Jo Dil Mai Ho Wo Khwab Na Todna Har Kadam Par Milegi Kamyabi Apko Sirf Sitare Chhune Ke Liye Kabhi Zami Na Chhodna

7: Jane Kyu Hame Asu Bahana Hai Ata Jane Kyu Hale Din Batana Nahi Ata Kyu Sathi Bichhad Jate Hai Hamse Shayad Hame Hi Sath Nibhana Nahi Ata

8: Khamoshi Ikrar Se Kam Nahi Hoti/sayary Sadgi Bhi Singaar Se Kam Nahi Hoti Ye To Apna Apna Nazariya Hai Warna Dosti Bhi Pyar Se Kam Nahi Hoti

9: Ek Sapne ki Trah Saja Kar Rakhu Apne Is Dil Me Hamesha Chhupa Kar Rakhu Meri Takdeer Mere Sath Nahi Verna Zindagi Bhar Ke Liye Use Apna Bana Kar Rakhu

10: Meethi Meethi Yade Palkho Pe Saja Lena Ek Sath Gujre Pal Ko Dil Me Basa Lena Nazar Na Au Hakikat Me Agar Muskura Kar Mujhe Sapno Me Bula Lena

20: ‚ù§Ô∏èNaa dhan-daulat, naa shauhrat, Aur naa waah-waah chahiye, Kaise ho? kahan ho? Bus in do shabdon ki parwaah chahiye ‚ù§Ô∏è

21: ‚ù§Ô∏èTumhaare ehsaas ki khushboo mere rom-rom mein samaayi hai, Ab tum hi batao,  Ki iski kaun si dawaayi hai?? ‚ù§Ô∏è

22: ‚ù§Ô∏èIshq mein judaayi bhi hoti hai, Ishq mein tanhaayi bhi hoti hai, Ishq mein bewafaayi bhi hoti hai, Tu thaam kar to dekh haath mera to pata chalega, Ki ishq mein sachchayi bhi hoti hai..‚ù§Ô∏è

23: ‚ù§Ô∏èHoon main tumhaare hi paas mein, Jaraa khyaal karke to dekh lo,  Apni in nigaahon ki bajaay, Dil kaa istemaal kar ke dekh lo.‚ù§Ô∏è

24: ‚ù§Ô∏èWo pyaar hi kya Ki jisme koi hisaab ho‚Ä¶ Agar hai tumhe pyaar kisi se, To bus be-hisaab ho‚Ä¶.‚ù§Ô∏è

25: ‚ù§Ô∏èDil ki kitaab mein gulaab uska tha, Raaton ki neend mein khwaab uska tha, Kitna pyaar karti ho jab puchha usse maine, Mar jaungi tumhaare bina jawaab uska tha.‚ù§Ô∏è

26: ‚ù§Ô∏èChhupa lein hum ek doosre ko apni aagosh mein is tarah ki hawaa bhi naa gujar paaye, Ho jaayein madhosh ek doosre ki mohabbat mein is kadar, Ki hosh mein hi naa aa paayein‚ù§Ô∏è

27: ‚ù§Ô∏èWo samay wo pal kuchh ajeeb honge, Is duniya mein jab hum khushnaseeb honge, Door hone par jo itna yaad karte hain hum aapko, Kya hoga jab aap mere kareeb honge !!!‚ù§Ô∏è

28: üòò Chaahu to naam likh doo uska apni har shayari ke saath Lekin phir sochta hoon ki Bahut bholi hai meri jaan, kahin badnaam naa ho jaaye !! üòò

29: üòò Bahut achchhi hansi thi kabhi hamaari, Magar jab se fasa hoon jaal mein unke, Unse sharmaane ka ye aalam hai, Ki ab hum ruk ruk kar hasne lage hain‚Ä¶ üòò

30: üòò Fir se shayari likhun, Fir se usi tarah likhun, Tum kaho to tumhaare naam ke saath wafaon ka taraana likhun, Tum kaho to wahi ehsaas likhu Tum kaho to tumhaare khwaabon ka aana-jaana likhun !!! üòò
